entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 04:57 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -35.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
